snippet: A barrage of negative economic data appears to have stirred leaders into acknowledging that austerity policies aren’t working.
abstract: Editorial expresses hope that barrage of negative economic data will stir European leaders and senior officials at International Monetary Fund to finally acknowledge that Continent's austerity policies are imposing unnecessary pain and suffering and doing little to lower debts and deficits.
lead_paragraph: A barrage of negative economic data appears to have stirred leaders into acknowledging that austerity policies aren’t working.
